text: [Music]
I'm Muhammad chadri uh director it
operations for the mle fool mtle fool is
a financial services company we're based
off of Alexandria Virginia my job at the
mtle fool is to manage the technology
platform on which fool.com runs we are a
financial services company in the
business of providing Financial advice
to individual investors the way we look
at the cloud at the mly fools
strategically we have moved to S3
primarily as a backup Target and that
essentially plays a key role into our
Disaster Recovery scenarios that most of
our data is stored in S3 and at its peak
it was about 40 to 50 tabes of data our
Disaster Recovery scheme right now is on
Prem infrastructure a storage
infrastructure which is augmented by S3
and in future that would be augmented by
glacier as well one of the Strategic use
cases for us was the migration of our
Australia operations onto AWS our
Australia site was running on Prem
technology platform in the East Coast of
United States and the page loow times in
Australia were not acceptable to us and
that includes essentially migration of
our front-end web servers putting a load
balancing solution in place migration of
a backend database servers and putting a
caching solution in place so all
happened end to endend within about a 1
month to two month time frame and our
page load times which is one standard
with which we measure our performance it
dropped by 30% that's a pretty
significant positive sign for us that uh
uh it as AWS is helping us grow
strategically and we do plan on
leveraging AWS further in our
International expansion and some of our
mission critical internal uh us-based
applications as well
